title: Causal inference in survival analysis
text: R package causal inference survival analysis.name “inga” comes Japanese word 「因果(いんが)」,means cause effect. goal inga provide causal methods survival analysis(Hernan Robins, n.d.) reproduce code book “First Course Causal Inference”.(Ding, n.d.)

title: Average Causal Inference — ace
text: function computes average causal inference two groups.

title: Average Causal Inference — ace
text: treatment numeric vector representing treatment group control numeric vector representing control group

title: Average Causal Inference — ace
text: numeric value representing average causal inference

title: Average Causal Inference — ace
code: treatment <- c(5, 10, 15, 20) control <- c(3, 8, 12, 18) ace(treatment, control) #> [1] 2.25

title: NHEFS Dataset — nhefs
text: subset data National Health Nutrition Examination Follow-Study (NHEFS).

title: NHEFS Dataset — nhefs
text: data frame 1,629 rows 64 columns: seqn Sequence number (unique identifier participant) qsmk Smoking cessation status (0 = continued smoking, 1 = quit smoking) death Death status (0 = alive, 1 = deceased) yrdth Year death modth Month death dadth Day death sbp Systolic blood pressure (mmHg) dbp Diastolic blood pressure (mmHg) sex Gender (0 = male, 1 = female) age Age years baseline race Race (1 = white, 2 = black, 3 = ) income Annual income US dollars education Years education wt71 Weight 1971 (lbs) wt82 Weight 1982 (lbs) wt82_71 Weight change 1971 1982 (lbs) exercise Frequency exercise (1 = none, 2 = moderate, 3 = high) active Physical activity status alcohol Alcohol consumption status (0 = , 1 = yes) chol Total cholesterol level (mg/dL) smokeintensity Number cigarettes smoked per day smokeyrs Number years smoked ht Height inches diabetes Diabetes status (0 = , 1 = yes) marital Marital status (1 = married, 2 = widowed, 3 = divorced/separated, 4 = never married) mental Mental health status score physact Physical activity level score pef Peak expiratory flow (L/min) heart_disease History heart disease (0 = , 1 = yes) stroke History stroke (0 = , 1 = yes) cancer History cancer (0 = , 1 = yes) asthma Asthma diagnosis (0 = , 1 = yes) bronchitis Bronchitis diagnosis (0 = , 1 = yes) emphysema Emphysema diagnosis (0 = , 1 = yes) hosp Number hospital visits physvis Number physician visits depress Depression score alcohol_freq Frequency alcohol consumption diet_score Diet quality score vitamin_use Vitamin supplement use (0 = , 1 = yes) medication_use Medication usage status (0 = , 1 = yes) insurance Health insurance coverage status (0 = , 1 = yes)
